TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对象传递给任何事件处理程序事件。The object is passed to any event handler for the event. 属性包含要插入的数据。The property contains the data that will be inserted. 可以使用对象数据源中执行插入操作之前检查的数据。You can use the object to examine the data before the insert operation is executed in the data source. 然后可以验证数据，检查数据类中的验证错误或更改更新前的值。You can then validate the data, examine validation errors from the data class, or change a value before the update. 此外可以取消插入操作。You can also cancel the insert operation. 如果该对象表示数据源引发验证异常之前它将数据，插入属性包含的一个实例类。If the object that represents the data source throws a validation exception before it inserts the data, the property contains an instance of the class. 您可以检索通过所有验证异常属性。You can retrieve all the validation exceptions through the property. 如果不验证会引发异常，属性包含`null`。If no validation exception is thrown, the property contains `null`. 如果处理验证异常，并且不想要重新引发的异常设置属性设置为`true`。If you handle the validation exceptions and do not want the exception to be re-thrown, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的处理程序事件。The following example shows a handler for the event. 中的对象属性强制转换为一个名为类型`Product`。The object from the property is cast to a type named `Product`. `DateModified`属性的`Product`对象设置为当前日期和时间。The `DateModified` property of the `Product` object is set to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 它通过使用显示的任何验证异常消息控件。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Inserting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message + "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Inserting(object sender, LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

summary.span: 获取在执行插入操作之前验证数据时引发的异常。

span.span: Gets the exception that was thrown while the data was being validated before the insert operation.

value.span: 如果发生错误，则为该异常；否则为 。

span.span: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果执行插入操作之前引发验证异常，该异常存储在属性。If a validation exception is thrown before the insert operation is performed, the exception is stored in the property. 中的处理程序事件，可以检索通过异常属性。In a handler for the event, you can retrieve the exception through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的处理程序事件。The following example shows a handler for the event. 它通过使用显示的任何验证异常消息控件。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Inserting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message + "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Inserting(object sender, LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExceptionHandled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示异常是否已得到处理而不该再次引发。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.

value.span: 如果异常已得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以创建事件处理程序事件来检查在插入操作之前发生的验证异常。You can create event handlers for the event to examine validation exceptions that occurred before the insert operation. 如果处理异常，并且不希望它再次引发设置属性设置为`true`。If you handle the exception and do not want it to be thrown again, set the property to `true`. 如果未设置属性设置为`true`，异常将传播到调用堆栈中的下一个事件处理程序。If you do not set the property to `true`, the exception will be propagated to the next event handler in the call stack. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 它通过使用显示的任何验证异常消息控件。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Inserting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message + "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Inserting(object sender, LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

summary.span: 获取包含要插入数据的对象。

span.span: Gets the object that contains the data to insert.

value.span: 包含要插入数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the data to insert.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含要插入到数据源的数据。The property contains the data that will be inserted into the data source. 创建一个处理程序事件并检索属性，以便验证数据、 更改数据，或取消插入操作之前执行数据操作。Create a handler for the event and retrieve the property in order to validate the data, change the data, or cancel the insert operation before the data operation is executed. 属性返回类型的对象。The property returns an object of type . 可以将此对象表示的数据的类的类型强制转换。You can cast this object to the type of the class that represents the data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的处理程序事件。The following example shows a handler for the event. 中的对象属性强制转换为一个名为类型`Product`。The object from the property is cast to a type named `Product`. `DateModified`属性的`Product`对象设置为当前日期和时间。The `DateModified` property of the `Product` object is set to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)]
